--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Over a lush valley a thunderous noise stirs the natural habitat. 
Over a
> large building of dust, a stampede of wild stallions can be seen,
> running away from a group of hyenas, as a Hawk keep watch over top. 
A
> hyena leaps, and grabs one of the horses.
> 
> 
> The D.E.D ships DNA scanner juts out of the top of the ship. The 
blue
> energy wave sweeps over the area, and covers the large group of 
animals.
> "Protoform DNA, selected." the computer interupted over the ships 
audio
> systems. Inside the CR chambers holding Nightmare and Jagged, the
> brothers began to be repaired, and changed.

::LONG HAUL::

    Inside Long Haul waits for the scanner to finish. He leaned up 
against the wall, arms crossed, with an impatient glint to his stare. 
Figuring doing something was better than looking like a loafer, he 
began to clean up the premisis.
    'Wait, wait, wait." he muttered to himself, obviously impatient. 
He hated repairs, both being and helping those 'on the table'. "It's 
positively boring!" He paused and looked at the scanner's DNA results. 
He smiled at the choice. "This" he said, voice bright with amusement, 
"should be interesting!!"

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
